word:
John is shown that in these last days a remnant will be keeping the commandments of God. Where are they? In a description given of the workings of Satan it says, "And the dragon was wroth with the woman, and went to make war with the remnant of her seed, which keep the commandments of God, and have the testimony of Jesus Christ." Who are the people here specified?--Ms 1, 1892. ("Obedience to God Required," November 15, 1892.) 

Released March 24, 1975.
